remediation.description:
The RHACS Operator will enable teams to:
1. Speed up the time to show security value using one-click installation procedures in the OpenShift console
2. Reduce the need for complex configuration procedures
3. Embrace GitOps practices by using simplified configuration as yaml

note: Red Hat Advanced Cluster security releases a new Operator to simplify installation and accelerate security use cases.

To accelerate implementation of security use cases the Red Hat Advanced Cluster security team has released a new Operator as the primary source of installation on OpenShift 4.6 and above. This will simplify operational the experience by standardizing installation methods through the Operator Framework.
